name: ChnLove
overview:
ChnLove is the most popular selection for the world singles to search for Chinese girls for date and marriage.

Introduction

Chnlove.com was launched in 1998 and is now one of the largest leading international online dating platforms in Asia. Formed as a member of Qpid Network, Chnlove’s unique online solutions have allowed thousands of global members to realize their dreams - seeking the perfect match in China.

Currently, Chnlove has cooperated with local matchmaking agencies in more than 30 major cities in mainland China and other countries in Asia, and continues to attract thousands of sincere single gentlemen every day, making cross-cultural relationships healthy and successful. Chnlove achieves an amazingly high success rate among sites alike, and we are dedicated to growing into one of the world’s largest and most trusted online platforms.

Solutions

Behind Chnlove are the innovative technology, strong collaboration with local agencies, local wisdom and an excellent customer care team. Ladies and gentlemen are empowered to break immediate language barriers and enjoy a smooth communication by the unique EMF-Mail Forwarding Service, which proves to effectively help make a relationship blossom in two cultures.

To add value of our services to members, Chnlove is now cooperating directly with qualified companies offering visa and gift services to create impactful and strategic solutions. Click here to learn more.

Integrity

While Chnlove’s commitment to protecting rights of members and increasing success rates remains its trademark, our collaborated agencies are required to strictly follow specific rules and procedures in use and verify the authenticity of all content of ladies’ profiles (photos and personal information) displayed on Chnlove.com, as well as meeting our high expectations for accuracy, integrity and trust as demonstrated every day in the communication between ladies and gentlemen. In the meantime, male profiles are also strictly inspected by Chnlove. We place credibility and brand image above all else while running the business toward our goal.

We take online security very seriously. Chnlove’s online purchasing system is protected by industry standard security - in this case, GeoTrust and Trustwave, the world’s leading Certificate authorities. You can confirm that the information exchange between you and Chnlove is secure by clicking on the GeoTrust trust mark (the GeoTrust logo) or the Trustwave commerce seal.
